abstract: An appearance on MTV may offer a clue to how Gary M. Milby spent some of the $19 million that federal regulators contend he ripped off from investors.
snippet: An appearance on MTV may offer a clue to how Gary M. Milby spent some of the $19 million that federal regulators contend he ripped off from investors.
lead_paragraph: Clues to how the elusive Kentucky oil-and-gas man Gary M. Milby may have spent some of the $19 million that federal regulators contend he ripped off from investors may have turned up in an unlikely place.

headline.main: A Sweet 16 Party, but Not for Investors
headline.print_headline: A Sweet 16 Party, But Not for Investors
